ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: If you are really confident in your CS ability or you want to ignore the jungle until your get close to your skadi, replace this with 2 slippers
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Somewhat situational item but I consider it core since it allows you to farm that jungle quite fast and the attack speed helps with keeping the skadi debuff up on the target

AbilityTooltips.spectre_spectral_dagger: Max this first, you need the MS to properly chase targets and escape ganks
AbilityTooltips.spectre_desolate: Maxed second to get the damage going
AbilityTooltips.spectre_dispersion: Get one level at the start for the laning phase, then ignore it until Dagger and Desolate are maxed
AbilityTooltips.spectre_haunt: Get it at six, if you are desperate for starts you can skip level 2 and 3 of the ult, it just increases the duration.
